column4: hi...ï»¿Since i installed firestarter on my ubuntu hardy, i can no longer get Transmission BitTorrent client working. I ve tried to open the port by making an inbound policy, but still testing that port in Transmission preferences tells me "port closed"...
why did you install firestarter at all?
we think you should remove software which does your system harm and you don't understand sufficiently to use it
